title: Filibert Bolger, Wily Rascal (2C101)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 1 • Hobbit
Strength:	1
Vitality:	2
Site:	1
Game Text:	Skirmish: Exert a Hobbit companion twice to cancel a fierce skirmish involving that Hobbit.
Lore:	Filibert knows paths and tracks that few have trodden. He is not adventurous by nature, but his escapades often require rapid departures.
Rarity:	C
